title: Igor Joksimović
text:
Igor Joksimović ( born 16 August 1980) is a <a href="Bosnian%20Serb">Bosnian Serb</a> retired <a href="Association%20football">football</a> striker.
Club career.
He played in the youth team of Partizan Belgrade. In 2002 move to home city and signed for FK Leotar where was champion in his first season. Scored one of the most important goals that season for title against Siroki Brijeg in last minute of the game. Good performance in few season in Leotar recommend him in Ukraine football 2005. He had good experience in Asian football where play well for <a href="PSIS%20Semarang">PSIS Semarang</a> in <a href="2007%E2%80%9308%20Liga%20Indonesia%20Premier%20Division">Highest Level Division in Indonesia on 2007</a>.
He signed for <a href="KS%20Shkumbini%20Peqin">KS Shkumbini Peqin</a> in January 2009. However, he then quit the club on 20 May 2009 along with <a href="Cvete%20Deliovski">Cvete Deliovski</a>, <a href="Ahmed%20Mujdragi%C4%87">Ahmed Mujdragić</a>, the club president and the club's manager.
